info.author: Darrel O'Pry
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Xplat
=====

Xplat (splat) provides a consistent api for common functions that are
not standard across platforms.

**API**

get_username()::

    from xplat import xplat
    xplat.get_username()

info.name: xplat
info.html_description:
Xplat (splat) provides a consistent api for common functions that are not standard across platforms.

API

get_username():

from xplat import xplat
xplat.get_username()
